AUROC=0.7628651677581724	AUPRC=0.7438350466766025	Accuracy=0.7127799736495388	MCC=0.4303246598359521	Recall=0.8244274809160306	Precision=0.6849894291754757	f1_score=0.7482678983833718

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.76      0.59      0.67       366
        case       0.68      0.82      0.75       393

   micro avg       0.71      0.71      0.71       759
   macro avg       0.72      0.71      0.71       759
weighted avg       0.72      0.71      0.71       759
